name: Yiin Minus Yaang
description:
Darkness and Light, Yiin and Yaang, hold the balance of our world in the palm of their hands. But when Yaang suddenly goes missing, the elements fall into chaos and it’s up to Yiin to reunite with his lost love and save their home from crumbling beneath their feet.

-☯-

Yiin Minus Yaang is a 2D platformer where you follow Yiin through the treacherous lands while he restores harmony to their home on his quest to find his beloved counterpart, Yaang. Solve puzzles that are unique to each special elemental environment and collect light fragments to begin restoring order to the world.

-☯-

Will Yiin be able to reach Yaang and return balance to their home before it collapses around them? Their fate lies within your hands.

__________________________________________

This game is a demo/prototype that I made to learn unity. The gameplay lasts a couple minutes and features only one level currently, but I plan to perhaps expand this further in the future!
